stakeholder_needs: Print the Fibonnaci Sequence to an N depth.
N should be provided as a cli argument when calling your project

Technology.name: Rust programming language
Technology.details: The application must be written in the Rust programming language.

QualityAssurance.name: Functionality correctness
QualityAssurance.details: The application should correctly print the Fibonacci Sequence.

QualityAssurance.name: Functionality correctness
QualityAssurance.details: The application should print to the correct depth.
